recipes.name: Pancakes
recipes.instructions: Mix all ingredients and cook on a hot griddle.

recipes.name: Spaghetti
recipes.instructions: Boil pasta. Brown meat with onion and garlic. Add sauce and simmer. Combine and top with cheese.

recipes.name: Tacos
recipes.instructions: Brown meat with seasoning. Warm shells. Assemble with toppings.

recipes.name: Pizza
recipes.instructions: Stretch dough, add sauce and toppings. Bake at 450°F until crust is golden.
